txt.en: 'Bah! You got lucky.'
'This is who Harnion sent to spar with us? This shouldn't take long...'
'Hmph.'
'Thanks for warming [placeholder] up for me. Now let a real soldier do the job.'
Instance: Sparring in Minas Tirith
'Wow... you are strong.'
'Come, now. You must be getting tired.'
'I just... wasn't ready.'
'Heh.'
'Think you can handle two of us?'
'I suppose I have more practicing to do...'
'You'll be nursing some wounds tomorrow.'
'Alright, you have ten seconds to prepare yourself... then we're coming at you!'
'Agh. That's going to sting tomorrow...'
<rgb=#FF0000>You must not be defeated by the soldiers</rgb>
'You think you're ready for us?'
You have been bested by the soldiers!
Well done, adventurer!'
'Well, that's sure to humble them a bit! Well done. They'll certainly redouble their training after that showing of skill, with or without my orders!'
'Now come back up here. If you have strength left in you to walk, that is.'
Go to the centre of the sparring area.
Spar with the soldiers until you've faced them all.

'[placeholder], the threat of battle has been lingering for quite some time now, and the soldiers have grown restless from anticipation. A sparring session will do them some good. It will help them practice, but it may also relieve some of their nerves!\n\n'If you think you can take them, head on down to the centre of the room.'
'Alright, soldiers! You have a new challenger. Prepare yourselves!'
'Well done, [placeholder]. I think the soldiers deserve a bit of a rest now.'
Harnion, the Master-at-Arms of the Training Ground, has asked for your aid in helping the soldiers with their sparring skills.
Talk to Harnion about the sparring match.
Talk to Harnion about sparring with the soldiers.
Spar with the soldiers
Go to the centre of the sparring area
Yay!
Talk to Harnion
Return to Harnion
The soldiers of Minas Tirith could always use a new sparring partner.
'I yield, I yield!'
